channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CA

item.title: Report X-2024050140
item.description:
Report X-2024050140

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-06T15:11:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: CHINO
  • State: CA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package handler noticed a strong odor coming from hazmat package and informed management. QA-Admin was called to collect the package and placed it inside a hazmat bag with absorbent, and bag was placed inside a hazmat tote. Package was brought to vent. Upon further investigation the QA discovered one of the bottles had a loose cap and entire contents leaked out of one bottle.

item.description:

  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER CALLED TO A LEAKER FOR UNLOAD, UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER NOTICED A CLASS 3 FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND LABEL, FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE TO CLEAN UP SPILLAGE. THEN RESPONDER TRANSPORTED THE PACKAGE TO THE DMP AND FOLLOWED THE RESPONSE SHEET FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
